title: EMAIL TAGS
creator: ridgesurveying
content: Trying to see email tags (from desktop) on Android app, starred emails are showing. I see Star on pulldown menu (rt side 3 bars) but not tags? I don't know where to change a setting, to display Tags as a option. Loving the Desktop version, trying to get mobile to work with it. Thanks
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/135.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android
